sentences.sContent: In their own process of urbanization, every country will encounter the problem of land requisition and housing demolition.
sentences.sContent_eng: In their own process of urbanization, every country will encounter the problem of land requisition and housing demolition.
sentences.sCn: 每个国家在自己的城市化进程中，都会遇到土地征用、房屋拆迁的问题。

remMethod.val: 来自urbanize(vt. 使都市化； 使文雅)

words.tran: 彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的；都市化的

trans.tranOther: Urbanization is the process of creating cities or towns in country areas
